metadata.title: CVE-2018-14359 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Mutt before 1.10.1 and NeoMutt before2018-07-16. They have a buffer overflow via base64 data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14359` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.5.24-1ubuntu0.1
mutt-patched - 1.5.24-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.24-1ubuntu0.1').
